reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

title.narrative: Tonga Police Development Programme Phase II

description.narrative: The second phase of the tripartite (Tonga, New Zealand, Australia) Tonga Police Development Programme which will run from 2013 to 2018. The aim is to continue to develop the skill set of the the Tonga Police Force and improve community confidence in Tonga Police.
